text: The Zero Boys is a 1986 action horror movie directed by Nico Mastorakis and stars Kelli Maroney, Joe Estevez, Crystal Carson, and Daniel Hirsch. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 action movies Category:1986 horror movies Category:American action movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by Nico Mastorakis Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: The Zero Boys
